title: A Marriage Deception - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adultery   Affair   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Netorare   Revenge   Suicides

description: After marrying Alex for three years, Crystal finds out the marriage is just a lie. A lie Alex makes to take revenge on her for Maya, his first love.>
